project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a simple contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts, while storing the contacts in a JSON file and interacting with the user via the terminal.

task.name: Implement feature to search for contact
Implement feature to save contacts to a JSON file
Implement feature to load contacts from a JSON file
Provide user interface in the terminal
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
